intro: Kohlrauschia, commonly known as the silverleaf plant, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its silver or grayish foliage, which results from dense covering of fine hairs on the leaves. The flowers are typically small and clustered in composite heads, often displaying a range of colors from white to purple. Kohlrauschia species are native to various regions in Africa and are often found in arid or semi-arid environments. These plants are valued for their ornamental appeal and ability to thrive in dry conditions.
